data.actual_result: The audio/music is downgraded to bitrate/quality of Voice chat.
data.expected_result: The audio/music from external apps shouldn't be affected by Discord after leaving VC.
data.short_description: Voice Chat quality affects other apps after leaving VC
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice chat on any server. - Leave the voice chat. - Open any music/audio app and try playing music. - Notice the lower bitrate/quality of music similar to VC. - Force stop discord and listen to music/audio again.
